info.name: aw-api-dao
info.description:
This document describes APIs for DAO related operations.

All paths are prefixed with `/v2/dao`.

The old prefix i.e. `/v1/eosdac` is currently supported but it will soon be permanently removed.  
API clients are encouraged to start migrating their apps to utilise the new prefix.

item.name: List all DACs and their respective info

query.description:
Filter the list by dacId.

[length: 5-6 characters]

request.description: Provides list of all available DACs along with their respective detailed information e.g. balance, statistics and globals.

response.name: list all dacs
response.body:
